package2.sequenceHandling
Class SequenceTools

java.lang.Object
  package2.sequenceHandling.SequenceTools

public class SequenceTools
extends java.lang.Object

Toolkit to handle SequenceDNA, do not directly access SequenceDNA methods.

Author:
kingcarlxx

static SequenceAA DNA2Protein(SequenceDNA seq, int TranslationTable, int codonStart)
          Translates given SequenceDNA to SequenceAA using TranslationTable and codonStart Attention: codon with an ambigiuos DNA sequence will be translated to X (Xaa; any amino acid) The first codon will be translated using the special start codon translation table

DNA2Protein

public static SequenceAA DNA2Protein(SequenceDNA seq,
                                     int TranslationTable,
                                     int codonStart)
Translates given SequenceDNA to SequenceAA using TranslationTable and codonStart Attention: codon with an ambigiuos DNA sequence will be translated to X (Xaa; any amino acid) The first codon will be translated using the special start codon translation table

Parameters:
seq -
TranslationTable -
codonStart -
Returns:

Returns:
int-array of possible start codons (first position)

reverseComplement

public static SequenceDNA reverseComplement(SequenceDNA seq,
                                            boolean reverse,
                                            boolean complement)
Get the reverse or the complement or both of the passed SequenceDNA

Parameters:
seq - the sequence to convert
reverse - set to true if you want the reverse sequence
complement - set to true if you want the complement (lower strand) sequence
Returns:

getGCcontent

public static double getGCcontent(SequenceDNA seq)

findSequenceUpperStrand

public static int[] findSequenceUpperStrand(SequenceDNA searchFor,
                                            SequenceDNA searchIn)
Search for Sequence in a longer Sequence. Ambigious nucleotides are extended, but only in the motiv (sought for sequence). Searches only in the upper strand (not in the compliment sequence)

Parameters:
searchFor - SequenceDNA which is sought for
searchIn - SequenceDNA which is searched
Returns:
int[] index of first nucleotid of found sequence in searchIn; returns null if nothing found

findSequenceLowerStrand

public static int[] findSequenceLowerStrand(SequenceDNA searchFor,
                                            SequenceDNA searchIn)
Same as findSequenceUpperStrand(), but searches in complement sequence.

Parameters:
searchFor - SequenceDNA which is sought for
searchIn - SequenceDNA which's complement is searched
Returns:
int[] index of first nucleotid of found sequence in searchIn; returns null if nothing found

findSequenceProtein

public static int[] findSequenceProtein(SequenceAA searchFor,
                                        SequenceAA searchIn)
Search for Protein-Sequence in a longer Protein-Sequence. Ambigious aminoacids are extended, but only in the motiv (sought for sequence).

Parameters:
searchFor - SequenceAA which is sought for
searchIn - SequenceAA which is searched
Returns:
int[] index of first aminoacids of found sequence in searchIn; returns null if nothing found
